monster.name: Giant Ape

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. 30 (7d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 323, Ghosts of Saltmarsh
